p: The nr ITS2 region was amplified from all DNA by means of a semi-nested PCR approach. In the first PCR, the nr ITS (ITS1-5.8S-ITS2) was amplified with universal primers ITS1F-ITS4 ( White et al., 1990). For the second PCR, ITS3 and ITS4 ( White et al., 1990) tagged primers were used to amplify the ITS2 region of each DNA sample ( Voyron et al., 2017).
